# ValueChangedEventHandlerDelegate delegate

Provides delegate for notification of tags value change.

```csharp
public delegate void ValueChangedEventHandlerDelegate(ITwinPrimitive sender, 
    ValueChangedEventArgs args);
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| sender | Value tag where the change occurred. |
| args | Value change arguments. |
